headline: Inbound Engine Proposal
subheadline: A proven system for generating sales-ready opportunities through strategic paid advertising and lead qualification.
situationPoints: You've built a successful security system business through referrals and word-of-mouth, but growth has plateaued
Previous attempts at digital marketing with other agencies didn't deliver the quality of leads you need
You're looking to expand your service area and need a predictable flow of qualified commercial opportunities
Your team's time is valuable - you can't afford to chase unqualified leads or tire-kickers
You want to focus on what you do best (installations) while a partner handles lead generation
solutionOverview: We'll build an Inbound Engine that captures high-intent search traffic from businesses actively looking for security system installation and monitoring services. Every lead goes through our qualification process before reaching your team.

faqs.question: How quickly will I start seeing leads?
faqs.answer: Most clients see their first qualified leads within 2-3 weeks of campaign launch. It takes about 60-90 days to fully optimize campaigns and reach consistent performance.

faqs.question: What if the leads aren't qualified?
faqs.answer: Every lead goes through our qualification process before reaching you. If a lead doesn't meet the agreed criteria, we don't count it and we don't charge for it. Simple.

faqs.question: How is this different from other agencies I've tried?
faqs.answer: Most agencies just run ads and send you form fills. We qualify every lead, transfer calls live during business hours, and only count opportunities that match your criteria. We're accountable to outcomes, not activities.

faqs.question: What's the minimum commitment?
faqs.answer: We require a 90-day minimum commitment. It takes time to build momentum and optimize campaigns. After 90 days, the engagement is month-to-month.

faqs.question: Can I see the ads and landing pages before they go live?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. You'll approve all creative and messaging before anything goes live. We want you confident in how your brand is being represented.
